title: Facebook : number of followers of popular beauty brands 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand fans in millions for 10 number of Months.
The Brand fans in millions is highest at Month Bath & Body Works and lowest at Month Embelleze.
There is a difference of 5.79 between the maximum Month Bath & Body Works and minimum Month Embelleze.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Brand fans in millions for 10 number of Months.
Month Bath & Body Works has the highest Brand fans in millions and Embelleze has the lowest Brand fans in millions.
There is a difference of 5.79 between the maximum Month Bath & Body Works and minimum Month Embelleze.
Month Bath & Body Works is higher than any other Months with value 9.8, followed by Risqué, and Mary Kay Brasil. Down to Month Embelleze with the lowest value 4.01.
The Brand fans in millions has lowered over the past 10 Months.
The Month Embelleze has 1.74 times less Brand fans in millions than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 56.38.
